content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(117.5, -30.5)
Consists of steam engine(position (117.5, -30.5)), boiler(position (111.5, -32.0)) and offshore pump (position (107.5, -33.5))

### Copper plate mine at position(60.0, -60.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (not found) and a furnace at position(60.0, -60.0)
-  Burner inserter at position(60.5, -61.5) that puts into furnace at position(60.0, -60.0)

### Copper cable factory
No factory found

### Pipe network at position(107.5, -34.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Offshore pump at position(107.5, -33.5)
-  Pipe group at position(107.5, -34.5) with pipes [(107.5, -34.5), (108.5, -34.5), (109.5, -34.5), (109.5, -33.5), (109.5, -32.5), (109.5, -31.5)]

### Pipe network at position(111.5, -33.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Boiler at position(111.5, -32.0)
-  Pipe group at position(111.5, -33.5) with pipes [(111.5, -33.5), (112.5, -33.5), (113.5, -33.5), (114.5, -33.5), (115.5, -33.5), (116.5, -33.5), (117.5, -33.5)]

### Electricity network at position(119.5, -30.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Small electric pole at position(119.5, -30.5)
-  Steam engine at position(117.5, -30.5)

### Belt network at position(63.5, -53.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Belt at position(63.5, -53.5) with direction UP
-  Belt at position(64.5, -53.5) with direction UP

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when refueling boiler
-  Make sure to have coal in inventory to refuel the boiler
### Errors when connecting steam engine
-  Ensure steam engine is connected to a fluid system
-  Make sure to have input liquid for the steam engine
### Errors when smelting in furnace
-  Ensure furnace has ingredients to smelt
### Errors when using burner inserter
-  Make sure burner inserter has source items to put into furnace

### NAMESPACE
No utility functions defined by the agent.
No important variables assigned by the agent.
